WorkflowInfo.Name: Clear Windows Logs
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><MemorySet x:Name="setLogFolder" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="logFolder" VariableValue="C:\Windows\System32\winevt\Logs\" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /><FolderSize x:Name="getLogFolderSizeOriginal" activityLicenseType="1" id="114" name="FolderSize" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="%logFolder%" DisplayName="Get Folder Size" Description="Returns the size of a specified folder" HostId="2" HostName="DESKTOP-FPT3Q25" UserName="" Password="" TypeName="FolderSize" /><PowerShellScript x:Name="clearEventLogs" activityLicenseType="1" id="87" name="PowerShellScript" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:05:00" TimeInSeconds="300" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="PowerShell Script" Description="Executes a Powershell script on a local device" ScriptPath="" ScriptCode="Get-EventLog -LogName * | ForEach { Clear-EventLog $_.Log }" scriptSource="1" TableAsString="" HasParams="0" HostId="-1" HostName="{x:Null}" TypeName="PowerShellScript" /><PowerShellScript x:Name="clearAllLogs" activityLicenseType="1" id="87" name="PowerShellScript" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:05:00" TimeInSeconds="300" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="PowerShell Script" Description="Executes a Powershell script on a local device" ScriptPath="" ScriptCode="wevtutil el | Foreach-Object { wevtutil cl "$_" }" scriptSource="1" TableAsString="" HasParams="0" HostId="-1" HostName="{x:Null}" TypeName="PowerShellScript" /><FolderSize x:Name="getLogFolderSizeCleared" activityLicenseType="1" id="114" name="FolderSize" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="%logFolder%" DisplayName="Get Folder Size" Description="Returns the size of a specified folder" HostId="2" HostName="DESKTOP-FPT3Q25" UserName="" Password="" TypeName="FolderSize" /><FunctionCalculator x:Name="logFolderSizeDiff" activityLicenseType="1" id="198" name="FunctionCalculator" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Function Calculator" Description="Performs various calculations on variables" Formula="%getLogFolderSizeOriginal% - %getLogFolderSizeCleared%" TypeName="FunctionCalculator" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
